replies.msg:
一開波左邊制粒石
開完制之後 去粒石下邊
向上推 放完右手果下即刻左手拉個人去右邊
只要個人向緊右但又有推石個logo就搞掂 再推粒石出黎
要試好多次 然後抽到粒石之後
推去門口位 一入去即刻轉身推返粒石出黎
呢個bug觸發位好唔穩定 又係要試好多次
有時推得郁 有時推唔郁
主控隻角要招技要有流血果啲
海軍連專 土花連專都得
一隻用普攻打 一隻要靠出技能流血磨
打左我起碼15分鐘先過到
海軍麻煩啲 手唔夠長 隻王如果你一段時間唔打佢佢就會返返原位
要keep住拉住佢 然後佢有時無啦啦暴走既話出技就要即刻落返下面張圖
再即刻上返去 出技普攻拉住佢 最麻煩係要長期吸引佢仇恨值

8/20 Korea Server Patch Note
Discussion
Hello. This is Guardian Tales,'All the fun in the world'.

First of all, even when the hot summer weather persists, Thank you for your continued interest and support.

The news about the next update and We would like to inform drivers related to stamina.

First of all, in the part related to stamina, I want to solve the frustration of the drivers.

If you log in at 12 o'clock, you can get 50 additional stamina.

We are preparing to apply the next update as a starting point for content (orbital elevator) that does not consume stamina.



[Daily Stamina Payment]



Monday to Friday - 12:00 ~ 23:59 : 50 stamina / 19:00 ~ 23:59 : 50 stamina 100 Gems



Saturday to Sunday - 12:00 ~ 23:59 : 50 stamina / 19:00 ~ 23:59 : 70 stamina 200 Gems



In the long run, story content continues to be implemented and stamina is not consumed.

We plan to improve it step by step by adding content.

In addition, by collecting the suggestions of the drivers, We will guide you through some details, so please refer to the details below.





■ Guild Raid Improvement

-'Guild Raid Practice Mode' will be added.

-If network connection errors, etc. are stored during the guild raid, it will be improved so that the event is not deducted only once a day.



■ Hero awakening reset function added

-Awakening initialization consumes one Awakening Reset Stone.

-Upon initialization, all awakening information acquired by the hero is reset, and all awakening stones consumed by the awakening are Will be returned. (Gold spent on awakening is not returned.)

-The Awakening Reset Stone will be added as an initial beginner achievement, and you can pay all the existing rewards for completing the achievement. There is.



■ Challenge achievement expansion

-The number of targets to achieve the challenge achievement is subdivided.

-Goals that have already been achieved will be able to receive rewards immediately after the update.



[New Content]

■ Add track elevator -Contents available for progress after clearing in June will be added.

-Endlessly Battle up the tall tower one by one, Stamina is not consumed for combat entry.

-You can set the placement of heroes before entering the battle in the same way as the Colosseum.



■ New unpublished event chapter added

-New event chapters that have never been released will be released.-Event rewards include a large amount of experience to help drivers grow.

正啊喂 有得reset覺醒

quote.msg:
8/20 Korea Server Patch Note
Discussion
Hello. This is Guardian Tales,'All the fun in the world'.

First of all, even when the hot summer weather persists, Thank you for your continued interest and support.

The news about the next update and We would like to inform drivers related to stamina.

First of all, in the part related to stamina, I want to solve the frustration of the drivers.

If you log in at 12 o'clock, you can get 50 additional stamina.

We are preparing to apply the next update as a starting point for content (orbital elevator) that does not consume stamina.



[Daily Stamina Payment]



Monday to Friday - 12:00 ~ 23:59 : 50 stamina / 19:00 ~ 23:59 : 50 stamina 100 Gems



Saturday to Sunday - 12:00 ~ 23:59 : 50 stamina / 19:00 ~ 23:59 : 70 stamina 200 Gems



In the long run, story content continues to be implemented and stamina is not consumed.

We plan to improve it step by step by adding content.

In addition, by collecting the suggestions of the drivers, We will guide you through some details, so please refer to the details below.





■ Guild Raid Improvement

-'Guild Raid Practice Mode' will be added.

-If network connection errors, etc. are stored during the guild raid, it will be improved so that the event is not deducted only once a day.



■ Hero awakening reset function added

-Awakening initialization consumes one Awakening Reset Stone.

-Upon initialization, all awakening information acquired by the hero is reset, and all awakening stones consumed by the awakening are Will be returned. (Gold spent on awakening is not returned.)

-The Awakening Reset Stone will be added as an initial beginner achievement, and you can pay all the existing rewards for completing the achievement. There is.



■ Challenge achievement expansion

-The number of targets to achieve the challenge achievement is subdivided.

-Goals that have already been achieved will be able to receive rewards immediately after the update.



[New Content]

■ Add track elevator -Contents available for progress after clearing in June will be added.

-Endlessly Battle up the tall tower one by one, Stamina is not consumed for combat entry.

-You can set the placement of heroes before entering the battle in the same way as the Colosseum.



■ New unpublished event chapter added

-New event chapters that have never been released will be released.-Event rewards include a large amount of experience to help drivers grow.

正啊喂 有得reset覺醒

再上返去 所以全程都要高度集中
